issue.title: Is USB-C connected to ESP32-S3 USB OTG?
issue.body:
Hi,

I could not find any information about this on your sites.

Is the ESP32-S3 USB OTG connected to the USB-C connector?

issue.title: Web UI - remove flash message as inline element
issue.body:
Have flash messages.display as an overlay at the top.

That way the UI stays consistent when performing multiple actions (deletes, etc.) with the mouse.

issue.title: automatic links from http/https text
issue.body:
Hello,

thank you for all the awesome work and maintenance, much appreciated!

Would it be possible to have URLs to be detected automatically and be converted to [weblinks](https://github.com/drudru/ansi_up/issues/51)?

Thank you very much.

issue.title: automatic links from http/https text
issue.body:
Hello,

thank you for all the awesome work and maintenance, much appreciated!

Would it be possible to have URLs to be detected automatically and be converted to [weblinks](https://github.com/drudru/ansi_up/issues/51)?

Thank you very much.

comment.body:
Hi, thanks.

Unfortunately, I have experience with that feature. I implemented it in the past and it was too difficult to get right *and* secure. The issue is the streaming nature of the data.

The library does support the OSC tag for a URL, but you would need something to perform that wrapping before passing it to ansi_up.
